headline: Xactly Appoints Chief Marketing Officer and Chief Human Resources Officer To Fuel Next Phase of Growth
summary: Tiffany Sieve joins as CMO and Megan Barbier as CHRO to Accelerate Brand Expansion and People Strategy SAN JOSE, CA / ACCESS Newswire / October 28, 2025 /Xactly, a global leader in intelligent revenue solutions, today announced the appointments of ...
